body.p:
South Covington Ky
Oct the 31st 1861
To his Excellency, B Magoffin Govenor of Ky

Sir the undersigned, Justice of the Peace for Kenton County in the first magisterial Dist out side of Covington Ky, Repsectfully petitions his resignation as Justice of the Peace for said dist and County as above stated. as I expect to leave the state in a fiew days. I take pleasure in recomending Henry Horestmann as a suitable person to fill the vacancy.

Yours Respectfully
Lewis Richards J. P. K. C.

Kenton Co
J. P.
Resignation
L. Richardson
